card.name: CASHBACK SBI Card
card.bank: SBI Cards and Payment Services Limited
card.description: A credit card offering cashback rewards on online and offline spends with various benefits including fuel surcharge waiver and contactless payments.
card.target_audience: Personal users seeking cashback rewards on everyday spends.

categories.name: Online Spends
categories.description: 5% cashback on online spends without any merchant restriction.
categories.terms_and_conditions: Cashback not applicable on Merchant EMI & Flexipay EMI transactions and on specified categories such as Utility, Insurance, Fuel, Rent, Wallet, School & Educational Services, Jewelry, Railways etc. Maximum cashback capped at ₹5000 per statement cycle.
categories.how_to_earn: Make online transactions using the CASHBACK SBI Card.
categories.validity: Cashback credited within two working days of statement generation.
categories.exclusions: Merchant EMI, Flexipay EMI, fuel spends, and other specified MCC categories.

categories.name: Offline Spends
categories.terms_and_conditions: Same exclusions as online spends apply.
categories.how_to_earn: Make offline transactions using the CASHBACK SBI Card.
categories.validity: Cashback credited within two working days of statement generation.
categories.exclusions: Merchant EMI, Flexipay EMI, fuel spends, and other specified MCC categories.

bonus_rates.condition: Annual spends of Rs. 2 Lakh or more
bonus_rates.validity: Renewal fee reversed if annual spends for last year >= Rs. 2,00,000.
bonus_rates.terms_and_conditions: Renewal fee waiver applies on meeting annual spend criteria.

redemption.process: Cashback is auto-credited to the SBI Card account within two working days of the next statement generation.
redemption.terms_and_conditions: Cashback is adjusted automatically in the next statement.
redemption.processing_time: Within two working days of statement generation.

benefits.name: Fuel Surcharge Waiver
benefits.description: 1% fuel surcharge waiver across all petrol pumps in India on transactions between Rs. 500 and Rs. 3,000.
benefits.how_to_avail: Use the card for fuel transactions within specified limits.
benefits.value: 1% waiver, maximum Rs. 100 per statement cycle.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Applicable only on transactions of Rs. 500 - Rs. 3,000, exclusive of GST and other charges.

benefits.name: Contactless Advantage
benefits.description: Make fast and secure payments by tapping the card at contactless-enabled terminals.
benefits.how_to_avail: Tap the card at a secure reader for transactions up to Rs. 5000 without PIN.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Payment limit of Rs. 5000 per transaction for contactless payments.

benefits.name: Global Usage
benefits.description: Use your CASHBACK SBI Card at over 24 million outlets worldwide including 3,25,000 outlets in India.
benefits.how_to_avail: Use the card wherever VISA is accepted.

benefits.name: Family Empowerment
benefits.description: Issue add-on cards for family members above 18 years.
benefits.how_to_avail: Apply for add-on cards for parents, spouse, children, or siblings.

benefits.name: Cash Withdrawal
benefits.description: Withdraw cash from over 1 million VISA ATMs globally.
benefits.how_to_avail: Use the card at VISA ATMs worldwide.

benefits.name: Easy Bill Pay
benefits.description: Pay electricity, telephone, mobile and other utility bills using the card.
benefits.how_to_avail: Use Easy Bill Pay facility on SBI Card platforms.

benefits.name: Balance Transfer on EMI
benefits.description: Transfer outstanding balances from other credit cards to CASHBACK SBI Card and pay in EMIs at lower interest rates.
benefits.how_to_avail: Apply online or call helpline within 30 days of purchase.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Minimum transfer amount Rs. 5,000; max 75% of available credit limit; processing fee applicable.

current_offers.title: 5% Cashback on Online Spends
current_offers.description: Earn 5% cashback on online spends with no merchant restriction.
current_offers.terms_and_conditions: Exclusions apply as per cardholder T&Cs.
current_offers.exclusions: Merchant EMI, Flexipay EMI, fuel, utility, insurance, rent, wallet, school & educational services, jewelry, railways, etc.

current_offers.title: 1% Cashback on Offline Spends
current_offers.terms_and_conditions: Exclusions apply as per cardholder T&Cs.

current_offers.title: Fuel Surcharge Waiver
current_offers.description: 1% fuel surcharge waiver on transactions between Rs. 500 and Rs. 3,000.

perks.name: Contactless Payments
perks.description: Tap and pay up to Rs. 5000 without PIN for fast and secure transactions.
perks.how_to_use: Tap card at contactless-enabled POS terminal.
perks.terms_and_conditions: Payment limit of Rs. 5000 per transaction.

perks.name: Worldwide Acceptance
perks.description: Use the card at over 24 million outlets worldwide.

partnerships.benefit: Worldwide acceptance and contactless payment technology
partnerships.how_to_avail: Use card at VISA-accepting merchants and contactless terminals.

fees_and_charges.terms_and_conditions: Subject to change at discretion of SBICPSL and non-refundable.

fees_and_charges.waiver_conditions: Reversed if annual spends for last year >= Rs. 2,00,000.
fees_and_charges.frequency: Per annum from second year onwards
fees_and_charges.terms_and_conditions: Subject to change at discretion of SBICPSL.
